description: This file defines a singleton object 'Dimensions' providing convenient accessors for common dimension resources (padding sizes) in an Android application.

methods.name: paddingSmallPx
methods.description: Returns the small padding size in pixels from resources.

methods.name: paddingMediumPx
methods.description: Returns the medium padding size in pixels from resources.

methods.name: paddingLargePx
methods.description: Returns the large padding size in pixels from resources.
